Translations.Text: korolʹ skazav, "Prynosyatʹ yomu do meni." Koly kur'yer prybuv yomu, vin skazav, "Idutʹ nazad do vashoho lorda ta prosyatʹ yoho vyvchyty zhinok kotri rizhutʹ yikhni ruky. Miy Lord znaye tsilkom yikhni skhemy

(korolʹ) skazaly (do zhinok), "Shcho vy znayete pro vypadkovi koly vy postaralysya seduce Joseph?" Vony skazaly, "BOH zaboronyayutʹ; my ne znaly budʹ shcho z·hubnoho zdiysnyuvaly yo." Druzhyna hubernatora skazala, "Zaraz pravda perevazhala. YA yavlyayu soboyu odyn khto postaravsya seduce yo, ta vin yavlyav soboyu pravdyvyy
ya spodivayusya shcho vin zdiysnytʹ shcho ya nikoly ne vydav yoho u yoho vidsutnosti, dlya BOHA ne blahoslovlyaye skhemy betrayers
ya ne zayavlyayu nevynuvatistʹ dlya sebe. Sam prybichnyk poroku, krim dlya tsykh khto dosyahnuly myloserdya z moho Lorda. Miy Lord Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
korolʹ skazav, "Prynoshu yomu meni, takym chynom ya mozhu naynyaty yoho popratsyuvaty dlya mene." Koly vin rozmovlyav z nym, vin skazav, "Sʹohodni, vy mayete vydatnu pozytsiyu z namy
Vin skazav, "Roblyu meni kaznachey, dlya ya zaznayusʹ u tsiy oblasti ta knowledgeable
My takym chynom vstanovyly Joseph na zemli, postanova tomu shcho vin pobazhav. My zlyva nashe myloserdya na whomever my budemo, ta my nikoly ne ne spromozhemosʹ shchob vidshkoduvaty spravedlyvyy
Dodatkovo, vynahoroda u U maybutnʹomu navitʹ krashche dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya
